thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Giuseppe Delcuratolo
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Giuseppe Delcuratolo

author: Giuseppe Delcuratolo
title: Giuseppe Delcuratolo
text:
321/5000
I recently discovered the Tomtop site and I could see the wide variety of items for sale. I recently purchased an Android TV Box and I was very pleased with the quality of the product and for the careful relationship Tomtop towards its customers. I recommend this supplier at all
